Name: Class Schedule
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent to all linked employees based on the intervals set below.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName

                                  Attached find a schedule of courses you are currently registered for. Please review this schedule and let us know if you have any questions.
                               
                                  Thank you!!

Name: Certification Expiration
TimingText: Once enabled, the following emails will be sent to selected receipents based on the intervals set below. For Each notification you have to choose the email frequency and  receipents.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName
                                           
                                            This is a reminder from the Training Department that your @Model.CertificateName certificate @Model.CertificateNumber will expire in @Model.DaysUntilCertificationExpiration days.Your expiration date is @Model.CertificateExpirationDate. To date, we have not received a copy of your updated @Model.CertificateName certificate.
                                            
                                            If you received this message in error or are no longer maintaining this certificate, we ask that you let us know so we can update our records.If you have any questions, please reach out to your Training Administrator.
                                            
                                            Thank you!

Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName,
                                            
                                            Your attention is required.This is a reminder from the Training Department that your @Model.CertificateName certificate @Model.CertificateNumber will expire in @Model.DaysUntilCertificationExpiration days.Your expiration date is @Model.CertificateExpirationDate. To date, we have not received a copy of your updated @Model.CertificateName certificate.
                                        
                                            If you received this message in error or are no longer maintaining this certificate, we ask that you let us know so we can update our records.If you have any questions, please reach out to your Training Administrator.
                                            
                                            Thank you!

Hello  @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName
                 
                                            Your immediate attention is required.This is an urgent reminder from the Training Department that your @Model.CertificateName certificate @Model.CertificateNumber will expire in @Model.DaysUntilCertificationExpiration days.Your expiration date is @Model.CertificateExpirationDate. To date, we have not received a copy of your updated @Model.CertificateName certificate.
                  
                                            After multiple notifications regarding the renewal of your @Model.CertificateName Credential, your management has also received a copy of this notification.You and your management will continue to receive daily reminders until the System Operations Training Team receives an updated copy of your @Model.CertificateName certificate.
                   
                                            If you received this message in error or are no longer maintaining this certificate, we ask that you let us know so we can update our records.If you have any questions, please reach out to your Training Administrator. 
                    
                                            Thank you!

Name: EMP Login
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent to any employee who is added as an EMP user when their username and/or login information is entered by a QTD Admin

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName

                                Welcome to the Employee Portal(EMP)! EMP is your gateway to complete critical training activities such as computer training classes, tests, procedure reviews and more.

                                Your Training Administrator has created an account for you in EMP which you can access via the link and username below:
                                Link: @Model.EMPWebsite
                                Username: @Model.EmployeeUserName

                                For security reasons, this email does not contain your account password.Please reset your password by clicking on “Forgot your Password ?” link on the EMP login page.

                                Important! The following internet browsers are supported: Internet Explorer, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge.We encourage you to login as soon as possible to ensure everything is working correctly. If you have any questions, please reach out to your Training Administrator.

                                Thank you!

Name: EMP Test
TimingText: The EMP Test email will be sent when a test is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName In order to receive credit for completion of @Model.CourseTitle, you must also complete the online test.You can access the test through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details.
Course Title @Model.CourseTitle
Instructor/Location @Model.Instructor/@Model.Location
Class Dates @Model.StartDate/@Model.EndDate
Test ID/Name @Model.TestId/@Model.TestTitle
Test Available Date @Model.ClassEndDate
Test Due Date @Model.TestDueDate
If you are unable to complete the pretest by the due date listed, contact your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP Pretest
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when a pretest is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been enrolled in a course which requires you to complete a pretest prior to the course start date.You can access the pretest through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details.
Course Title @Model.CourseTitle
Instructor/Location @Model.Instructor/@Model.Location
Class Dates @Model.StartDate/@Model.EndDate
Pretest ID/Name @Model.PretestId/@Model.PretestTitle
Pretest Available Date @Model.PretestAvailableDate
Pretest Due Date @Model.ClassStartDate
If you are unable to complete the pretest by the due date listed, contact your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP Course
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when a course is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned an online training course to complete.You can access the course through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details.
Course Title @Model.ILATitle
Instructor/Location @Model.Instructor/@Model.Location
Class Dates @Model.StartDate/@Model.EndDate
Course Available Date @Model.CourseStartDate
Course Due Date @Model.CourseEndDate
If you are unable to complete the course by the due date listed, notify your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP Student Evaluation
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when a student evaluation is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned to complete an evaluation for a course you recently completed.You can access the evaluation through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details.
Course Title @Model.ILATitle
Instructor/Location @Model.Instructor/@Model.Location
Class Dates @Model.StartDate/@Model.EndDate
Eval Available Date @Model.CourseEndDate
Eval Due Date @Model.EvalDueDate
If you are unable to complete the evaluation by the due date listed, notify your Training Administrator. Thank you!

Name: EMP Procedure Review
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when a procedure review is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned to complete a procedure review.You can complete the procedure review through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details.
Procedure Title @Model.ProcedureTitle
Review Available Date @Model.ReviewStartdate
Review Due Date @Model.ReviewEndDate
If you are unable to complete this procedure review by the listed due date, notify your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP IDP Review
TimingText: The EMP IDP review email will be sent when an IDP is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned to complete an IDP review.You can complete the IDP review through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details.
IDP Title @Model.IDPTitle
Review Available Date @Model.ReviewStartdate
Review Due Date @Model.ReviewEndDate
If you are unable to complete this procedure review by the listed due date, notify your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP Task Qualitification - Trainee
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when a task qualification is released for trainees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned to complete a Task Qualification as part of your position specific training program.An evaluator has been assigned to sign - off on this task qualification.This will be completed using the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details. To help you prepare for the task qualification, the task(s) below are available in a read - only format in EMP.
Task # @Model.TaskNumber
Task Statement @Model.TaskStatement
Evaluator Name @Model.EvaluatorName
If for any reason you cannot complete the assigned Task Qualification, notify your Task Qualification Evaluator and/or Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP Task Qualitification - Evaluator
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when a task qualification is assigned and released for evaluators to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned as an Evaluator to sign - off on a Task Qualification.This will be completed using the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details.
Task # @Model.TaskNumber
Task Statement @Model.TaskStatement
Trainee Name @Model.TraineeName
If for any reason you cannot complete the assigned Task Qualification(s), notify your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP Self-Registration Approval
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when self-registration is approved by a QTD Admin

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName

                                                Your self - registration request to enroll in @Model.CourseTitle on @Model.StartDate and @Model.EndDate has been approved.

                                                Thank you!

Name: EMP Self-Registration Denial
TimingText: Once enabled,this email will be sent when a self-registration is denied by a QTD Admin

Steps.Template:
Hello  @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName

                                            Your self - registration request to enroll in @Model.CourseTitle on @Model.StartDate and @Model.EndDate has been denied.

                                            Please contact your Training Administrator for additional information.

                                            Thank you

Name: EMP DIF Survey
TimingText: The EMP DIF Survey email will be sent when a DIF survey is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned to complete a DIF Survey.You can access the DIF Survey through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details. This survey is being conducted to help us improve both the initial and continuing training for @Model.PositionTitle position and your input is an important part of this process.You will be asked to review and rate the tasks you perform in terms of difficulty, importance, and frequency.Further instructions are provided once you start the survey.
Position Title @Model.PositionTitle
Survey Title @Model.SurveyTitle
Survey Available Date @Model.SurveyStartDate
Survey Due Date @Model.SurveyEndDate
If you are unable to complete the DIF Survey by the due date listed, notify your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!

Name: EMP GAP Survey
TimingText: The EMP GAP Survey email will be sent when a GAP survey is released for employees to complete.

Steps.Template:
Hello @Model.EmployeeFirstName @Model.EmployeeLastName You have been assigned to complete a GAP Survey.You can access the GAP Survey through the Employee Portal(EMP).Please review the table below for further details. This survey is being conducted to help us improve and provide on target training for @Model.PositionTitle position and your input is an important part of this process.
Position Title @Model.PositionTitle
Survey Title @Model.SurveyTitle
Survey Available Date @Model.SurveyStartDate
Survey Due Date @Model.SurveyEndDate
If you are unable to complete the GAP Survey by the due date listed, notify your Training Administrator as soon as possible. Thank you!
